parameters.name: parameters

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting spacecraft resource.

titleLine.description: Title line of Two Line Element (TLE).

value.description: A list of spacecraft resources in a resource group.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

SpacecraftListResult.description: Response for the ListSpacecrafts API service call.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

Spacecraft.description: Customer creates a spacecraft resource to schedule a contact.

port.description: TCP port to listen on to receive data.

EndPoint.description: Customer End point to store/retrieve data during a contact.

reservationStartTime.description: Reservation start time of a contact.

reservationEndTime.description: Reservation end time of a contact.

rxStartTime.description: Receive start time of a contact.

rxEndTime.description: Receive end time of a contact.

txStartTime.description: Transmit start time of a contact.

txEndTime.description: Transmit end time of a contact.

errorMessage.description: Any error message while scheduling a contact.

maximumElevationDegrees.description: Maximum elevation of the antenna during the contact in decimal degrees.

startAzimuthDegrees.description: Azimuth of the antenna at the start of the contact in decimal degrees.

endAzimuthDegrees.description: Azimuth of the antenna at the end of the contact in decimal degrees.

startElevationDegrees.description: Spacecraft elevation above the horizon at contact start.

endElevationDegrees.description: Spacecraft elevation above the horizon at contact end.

contactProfile.description: The reference to the contact profile resource.

minimumViableContactDuration.description: Minimum viable contact duration in ISO 8601 format.

minimumElevationDegrees.description: Minimum viable elevation for the contact in decimal degrees.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the service.

CloudError.description: An error response from the service.
